description:
According to http://pubs.vmware.com/vsphere-60/index.jsp, vsphere os types in openstack is not completed.
Missing 
suse64Guest	Suse Linux (64 bit)
suseGuest	Suse Linux
title: [vmware] missing os types: suseGuest64/suseGuest

comments.content:
According to http://pubs.vmware.com/vsphere-60/index.jsp, vsphere os types in openstack is not completed.
Missing 
suse64Guest	Suse Linux (64 bit)
suseGuest	Suse Linux

    Add missing os types: suseGuest64/suseGuest

    vsphere os types in openstack lack suseGuest64/suseGuest.
